title: failure to upload small text file to S3+compress
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone? I cannot copy a small local file (content: `123`) to S3+compress remote It fails with error ``` BadDigestThe Content-MD5 you specified did not match what we received.d577273ff885c3f84dadb8578bb41399Cr3pWSEOQp0EYXU/Aj4L5g==B60273C6B66E4A1AwaSWEItiupTc3weCov8Hw8ORuyOOzj9kPpznvb3aENVcsxfIIPk4a7hy97crYGk8DA2nwrwk9vA= ``` Copying to the underlying S3 remote works as expected. #### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`) https://beta.rclone.org/v1.54.0-beta.5062.db2c38b21/rclone-v1.54.0-beta.5062.db2c38b21-linux-amd64.zip #### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit) Ubuntu 18.04 Linux 4.15.0-128-generic #131-Ubuntu SMP Wed Dec 9 06:57:35 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux #### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive) S3 + Compress ``` [TestS3] type = s3 provider = AWS env_auth = false access_key_id = xxxx secret_access_key = xxxx region = us-east-1 edndpoint = acl = private [TestCompress] type = compress remote = TestS3: ``` #### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`) ``` echo 123 > test.txt ./rclone-v1.54.0-beta.5062.db2c38b21-linux-amd64/rclone copy -vvv --dump headers,bodies --log-file test.log test.txt TestCompress:ivatest20210111 ``` #### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
test.log ``` deex@hardy:~$ cat test.log 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.54.0-beta.5062.db2c38b21" starting with parameters ["./rclone-v1.54.0-beta.5062.db2c38b21-linux-amd64/rclone" "copy" "-vvv" "--dump" "headers,bodies" "--log-file" "test.log" "test.txt" "TestCompress:ivatest20210111"] 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "test.txt" 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/deex/.rclone.conf" 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : fs cache: adding new entry for parent of "test.txt", "/home/deex" 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "TestCompress:ivatest20210111" 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : You have specified to dump information. Please be noted that the Accept-Encoding as shown may not be correct in the request and the response may not show Content-Encoding if the go standard libraries auto gzip encoding was in effect. In this case the body of the request will be gunzipped before showing it. 2021/01/13 23:26:24 DEBUG : You have specified to dump information. Please be noted that the Accept-Encoding as shown may not be correct in the request and the response may not show Content-Encoding if the go standard libraries auto gzip encoding was in effect.
